label: AB2C4_oC28_63_c_ac_fg-001
title: Na$_{2}$CrO$_{4}$ ($H1_{8}$) Structure
comments:
This structure was originally determined by (Miller, 1936), who placed it in space group $Pnna$ \#52, and (Gottfried, 1938) uses this data for {\em Strukturbericht} $H1_{8}$. Subsequently (Niggli, 1954) rather acerbically pointed out that Miller's coordinates were consistent with the more compact $Cmcm$ \#63 space group.  This does not change the positions of the atoms in the conventional cell, so we use the compact structure as our prototype for {\em Strukturbericht} designation $H1_{8}$. 
 This structure is stable up to 413$^{\circ}$C. (Amirathanlingam, 1982)
